Name: ArbyG
Text: Wh...what? This FILE wants 0's AND 1's, but there's only caches of 0 available?

Name: BLIP
Text: No, it's okay! That last file helped me remember some of my programming...

Name: BLIP
Text: Now I can FLIP bits! I can turn a 0 into a 1 or a 1 into a 0

Name: ArbyG
Text: Okay! Do... do you need any managing?
